title: Cannot turn off 'Shortcut to prevent ringing'
content:
Not sure how I'm doing it, but somehow I hit the combination that turns on the 'Shortcut to Prevent Ringing' feature and once it's been toggled on you cannot toggle it off. Not sure it's accurate to call it a toggle since it does not seem to work both ways.
I don't know it's happened until suddenly I'm missing calls because the ringer is not working.
The first time I did it I was able to reset the phone and it came back as normal. But this time nothing seems to work.
So what's the trick here?
